description:
11.168 monochrome
Convert video to gray using custom color filter.

A description of the accepted options follows.
name: monochrome

options.description: Set the chroma blue spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.
options.name: cb

options.description: Set the chroma red spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.
options.name: cr

options.description: Set the color filter size. Allowed range is from .1 to 10. Default value is 1.
options.name: size

options.description: Set the highlights strength. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
options.name: high
